companyType.title: Legal Entity Type
companyType.description: Please specify the type of legal entity.

position.title: Director
position.description: Person from a group of managers who leads or supervises a particular area of your company.

position.title: Shareholder
position.description: Individual or institution that legally owns one or more shares of stock in your company.

position.title: UBO
position.description: The person or entity that is the ultimate beneficiary of the company.

position.title: Observer
position.description: Individual who attends company board meetings but is not an official member.

position.title: Authorised Signatory
position.description: Director or person who has been authorized to sign documents.

position.title: Other
position.description: Other type of company members.

companyType.title: Legal Entity Type
companyType.description: Please specify the type of legal entity.

companyName.title: Company Name
companyName.description: Please provide the name of your company, as it appears in official documents.

position.title: Manager
position.description: Person in charge of the LLC for day-to-day and long-term decisions.

position.title: Member
position.description: Owner of a limited liability company.

position.title: UBO
position.description: The person or entity that is the ultimate beneficiary of the company.

position.title: Observer
position.description: Individual who attends company board meetings but is not an official member.

position.title: Authorised Signatory
position.description: Director or person who has been authorized to sign documents.

position.title: Other
position.description: Designated nonmembers or outsiders.

companyType.description: Please specify the type of legal entity.

companyName.title: Company Name

position.title: Grantor
position.description: Person or entity that establishes the trust.

position.title: Beneficiary
position.description: Individual or group of individuals for whom a trust is created.

position.title: Trustee
position.description: The person who acts as the legal owner of trust assets.

position.title: Protector
position.description: Person who directs or restrain the trustees in relation to their administration of the trust.

position.description: The person or entity that is the ultimate beneficiary of the company.

position.description: Individual who attends company board meetings but is not an official member.
